backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing video uploads, camera mode settings, and storing analysis results with status tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend component files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting document title and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring QueryClient, theme provider, and routing between capture and analysis views.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisView.tsx: Video analysis interface with real‑time mock decisions, trajectory updates, and playback controls.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with anime‑styled branding, pulse heart icon, and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Animated header with branding, theme toggle, and anime gradient visuals.
frontend/src/components/UploadSection.ts: Empty file placeholder with no content.
frontend/src/components/VerdictCard.tsx: Component displaying verdict text, confidence bar, and reasoning with themed styling.
frontend/src/components/VideoCapture.tsx: Camera/video capture component handling recording, mode switching, and sending selected video upward.
frontend/src/components/VisualizationPan: Renders a live SVG visualization of ball trajectory using analysis frame data and current time.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and managing login/logout flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for uploading videos, checking status, fetching/storing analysis results, and managing camera mode via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom color variables and anime-style theme tokens for light/dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, and extensive custom color tokens, radius settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, features, issues, and pending requests for the MR.AI UMPIRE web app.
